message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $8,500. It's a great deal for both of us. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7,000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $7,000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $7,500. This is a fair price considering the value of the product. What do you say?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $7,500 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $7,200. Can you consider that?
